I just updated my sources from HEAD and get the following failure in
the unit tests:

    [junit] Running org.archive.crawler.frontier.AdaptiveRevisitHostQueueTest
    [junit] Tests run: 1, Failures: 1, Errors: 0, Time elapsed: 17.859 sec
    [junit] [ERROR] TEST org.archive.crawler.frontier.AdaptiveRevisitHostQueueTest FAILED
 
Has anyone else seen this?

heritrix (2)% javac -version
javac 1.5.0

heritrix (2)% java -version
java version "1.5.0"
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.5.0-b64)
Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 1.5.0-b64, mixed mode, sharing)

TIA,

    -tree
